feed.title: saubhik
feed.subtitle: Made with ❤️using vim & jekyll. Everything is open source.

entry.title: June
entry.content:
This month I would like to focus on:

  1. write about the DARTS code
  2. competitive programming

apart from usual work.

Personal

  • strengthen your will power.
  • eat more fruits & veggies, organic diet.
  • run at least 5 days in a week.
  • bi-classified life: code(includes reading/writing) or run.

Books

  • Competitive Programmer’s Handbook
  • Elements of Programming Interviews

I would like to read and blog about Design Patterns. But maybe it will not be possible to accommodate it this month. Higher priority to getting started in sport programming.

To the self who says that I am too old for contest programming:

Time is just an illusion. If you give the hours, you will become better.
entry.summary: This month I would like to focus on:

entry.title: New targets
entry.content:
I will try to set up monthly targets, and a blog each month will mention them. These monthly targets are separated from my daily work targets. This month my targets are:

Personal

  • read the paper and write about it.
  • read the official code and write about it.

Health

  • practice more zen.
  • run to burn 500 calories at least 5 days in a week.
  • eat yoghurt after running.
  • drink loads of water & green tea.

Others

  • make a music list to listen to while working.
